text: Jessica Shirley Madsen (born 11 April 1992) is an English actress. She is known for her roles as Clarice in the horror movie Leatherface (2017) and Cressida Cowper in the Netflix period drama Bridgerton (2020â€“present). Madsen was born in London and grew up in Surrey. She trained at the Guildhall School of Music and Drama, graduating in 2013.
